== Veluthur (CT) (627850) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Veluthur (CT) is a town in the [[Thrissur]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 5.81 sq. km. and harbouring 2866 households with total population of 11602 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 6 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 260 km. Male population is 5636 and female population is 5966. Scheduled Caste population is 1402 and Scheduled Tribes population is 11. Census Location Code of the town is 627850<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (Population 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 6 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 78 km. Railway station is at Thrissur at a distance of 6 km.
